OOC: Due to the fact Koj is a Ninja he Knows: Tai Chi (Soft style), 
Kendo(Soft style), Karate(Hard style), Ninjutsu(Hard and soft style), Kung 
Fu(Hard) But it depends on what kinda master your are and if your robots 
have a high sink ratio in Gestalt mode I guess by sink I mean Mind and body 
are one he master. Soft Style: Means Koj kept to focusing on the mind and 
less on the muscle power to learned skills. Hard Style means Koj used the 
style to aquire raw muscle power like the Eagle Claw I used to break 
Prebon's sword is a hard style move. Lai Tai strike the Kendo swing that 
create a enegry blast is soft style. Rookies point of view maybe wrong!!!!

::Koj::

"What I mean is people always give up things for people they love a person 
may even risk there life for another a person like that would care nothing

caused by love for a lover or a parent or a friend what do you think Koj?"
